get.description: Get all available task types that the assistant can handle.

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

get.description: Get one specific task. It has to be a task owned by the current user.

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

delete.description: This will cancel the task if needed and then delete it from the server.

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

get.description: Get a list of assistant tasks for the current user.

parameters.name: taskType
parameters.description: Task type id. If null, tasks of all task types will be retrieved (default: null)

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Task category. If null, tasks of all categories will be retrieved (default: null)

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

post.description: This endpoint will run the task synchronously.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Task type id

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: App id to be set in the created task

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Identifier to be set in the created task

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

post.description: This endpoint will schedule the task for it to run as soon as possible.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Task type id

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: App id to be set in the created task

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Identifier to be set in the created task

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

post.summary: Run or schedule a text processing task
post.description:
This endpoint will either run or schedule the task.
The choice between run or schedule depends on the estimated runtime declared by the actual provider that will process the task.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Task type id

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: App id to be set in the created task

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Identifier to be set in the created task

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

post.description: Parse and extract text content of a file (if the file type is supported)

parameters.name: filePath
parameters.description: Path of the file to parse in the user's storage

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

put.description: This endpoint will prevent a scheduled task to run by unscheduling it

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

post.summary: Run or schedule an image generation task

parameters.name: appId
parameters.description: App id to be set in the created task

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: Identifier to be set in the created task

parameters.name: nResults
parameters.description: Number of images to generate (default: 1)

parameters.name: displayPrompt
parameters.description: Option to include the prompt when displaying the result images (default: false)

parameters.name: notifyReadyIfScheduled
parameters.description: Whether a notification will be produced when the tasks has run if it was scheduled (default: false)

parameters.name: schedule
parameters.description: Force scheduling even if the task could run synchronously (default: false)

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

400.description: The image generation does not exist

404.description: The image generation has been deleted

get.summary: Get one image of a generation

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

post.description: Does not need bruteforce protection since we respond with success anyways (In theory bruteforce may be possible by a response timing attack but the attacker won't gain access to the generation since its deleted during the attack.)

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

post.summary: Set visibility of images in one generation

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

post.summary: Notify when image generation is ready
post.description: Does not need bruteforce protection since we respond with success anyways as we don't want to keep the front-end waiting. However, we still use rate limiting to prevent timing attacks.

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass
